SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off : ENDIF
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!----------------------------------------------- Parameter validation --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Puppet Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_PUP_PUPPET_PATH# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ Buidling Puppet run command -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = "puppet" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_PUPPET_OPTIONS# = "--onetime --no-daemonize --debug --detailed-exitcodes --color=false"
: IF &UC4RB_PUP_PUPPET_PATH# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_PUPPET_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = '&UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#' : ENDIF
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT("call ", &UC4RB_PUP_CMD#) : ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, ' agent &UC4RB_PUP_PUPPET_OPTIONS#')
! Set Execution Environment : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
: PRINT &UC4RB_PUP_CMD#
! Invoking command &UC4RB_PUP_CMD#
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** RUN AGENT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** RUN AGENT ACTION FAILED ********"
! Check error level based on platform : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS"
@set retcode=%errorlevel% if %retcode% == 0 ( : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO )
if %retcode% == 2 ( echo INFO: The puppet run succeeded, and some resources were changed. )
if %retcode% == 4 ( echo INFO: The run succeeded, and some resources failed. )
if %retcode% == 6 ( echo INFO: The run succeeded, and included both changes and failures. )
if NOT %retcode% == 0 ( echo ERROR: Fail to run agent. : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR )
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
: CASE "UNIX"
execcode=$? if [ "$execcode" -eq "0" ] ; then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO fi
if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] ; then case $execcode in 2) echo "INFO: The puppet run succeeded, and some resources were changed.";; 4) echo "INFO: The run succeeded, and some resources failed.";; 6) echo "INFO: The run succeeded, and included both changes and failures.";; *) echo "ERROR: Fail to run agent.";; esac : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR exit $execcode fi
: OTHER : ENDSWITCH
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
